claim.text_verbatim: MIMIC-III is a large, single-center database comprising information relating to patients admitted to critical care units at a large tertiary care hospital.
claim.notes: This pilot claim is designed to test that intake hard-requires verbatim claim text plus dataset/provenance anchors and context (who/when/where).
